component.name: VendorLabelList
component.script:
sub init() m.top.panelSize = "full" m.top.isFullScreen = true m.top.leftPosition = 130 m.top.focusable = true m.top.hasNextPanel = false m.top.createNextPanelOnItemFocus = false
m.top.list = m.top.findNode("vendorsCheckListNode") end sub
sub readVendorsForPurpose() m.readContentTask = createObject("roSGNode", "VendorReader") m.readContentTask.category = m.top.currentCategory m.readContentTask.observeField("content", "setLabelList") m.readContentTask.control = "RUN" end sub
sub setLabelList() m.top.list.content = m.readContentTask.content end sub
